attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To designate or purchase, on behalf of the U.K. tax payer, a building in London, that can be turned into apartments, for the sole use of Members of Parliament, whilst they have a seat in the House of Commons.
To dispense with the so called Allowance system has it now stands, immediately.
A new system to be put in place after the Summer recess, with no second homes allowance.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
